campaignEntries.rawText:
## Melee
# d100 Mishaps due to a Critical Failure on a Melee Attack

1. You drop your weapon and must use your next action to pick it up.
2. You overextend your swing and lose your balance, falling prone.
3. Your attack hits an ally standing adjacent to your target.
4. Your attack strikes an object in the environment (such as a nearby vase or statue) and destroys it.
5. Your weapon becomes lodged in a nearby wall or obstacle, taking a full action to retrieve.
6. You accidentally hit a pressure plate or tripwire, triggering a nearby trap.
7. Your attack misses so wildly that it strikes a different foe standing nearby.
8. You overexert yourself and suffer one point of exhaustion.
9. Your weapon breaks in the midst of the attack, becoming useless.
10. You accidentally damage a magical item carried by an ally or yourself.
11. Your attack does half damage to yourself as you recoil with the weapon.
12. Your attack hits your enemy's armor, causing them to become enraged and take an extra attack.
13. You slip on a puddle of water or patch of ice and fall prone.
14. Your weapon becomes stuck in a bone or armor joint, doubling the time to retrieve it.
15. Your attack misses so wildly that you hit an environmental object (like a torch) and extinguish it.
16. You accidentally hit an innocent bystander in the heat of combat.
17. Your attack causes an environmental hazard (like a fire) to ignite or grow larger.
18. You lose grip on your weapon and must spend a full action to regain it.
19. Your weapon flies out of your grasp and lands several feet away.
20. Your attack hits an enemy in just the wrong way, causing them to become immune to your damage type for the remainder of the combat.

## Dragon
| Dice Value | Name         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|------------|--------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 01-10      | Ashardalon   | An ancient and powerful red dragon, with scales as black as night and eyes that burn like embers. His wings are tattered and his breath weapon is a torrent of searing flames.                       |
| 11-20      | Nymaria      | A regal gold dragon, with a shimmering hide and an air of wisdom. Her breath weapon is a blast of radiant energy that can heal even the most grievous wounds.                                         |
| 21-30      | Vondal       | A sly and cunning green dragon, who delights in manipulating others to his will. He prefers to toy with his prey before finally striking for the killing blow.                                          |
| 31-40      | Ozyrrandion  | A blue dragon of massive size, with electricity crackling through his scales. He is fiercely territorial, and will not hesitate to defend his domain with his life.                                  |
| 41-50      | Xanathar     | A devious beholder with a penchant for hoarding treasure and manipulating those around him. Despite his monstrous appearance, Xanathar is surprisingly intelligent and well-spoken.                   |
| 51-60      | Sylas        | A silver dragon who takes on a humanoid form when dealing with mortals. He is kind and just, and is often sought out as a wise counselor and mediator.                                                   |
| 61-70      | Pyraxxis     | A brutish fire dragon with scales as red as blood. He is an indiscriminate destroyer, unleashing his fury upon everything in his path. Only the most skilled adventurers can hope to survive an encounter with Pyraxxis. |
| 71-80      | Yovirith     | A shadowy black dragon, who delights in causing fear and uncertainty among those she encounters. Her breath weapon is a cloud of darkness, which she uses to cloak her movements in combat.                |
| 81-90      | Rythnorax    | A young and curious bronze dragon, who enjoys spending time with humanoids and learning more about their ways. He is fiercely loyal to those he calls friends, and will not hesitate to aid them in times of need.     |
| 91-100     | Aevrak       | A massive and terrifying undead dragon, whose very presence saps the life from all around him. Many believe he is unkillable, and his lair is littered with the bones of those who have failed to defeat him.                     |

## Human
| Dice Value | Name | Description |
|------------|------|-------------|
| 1 | Aelar | Aelar is a tall, lean man with piercing blue eyes and a scruffy beard. He wears rugged leather clothing and carries a longbow and quiver of arrows. |
| 2 | Alaric | Alaric is a grizzled veteran with a thick mustache and scars criss-crossing his face. He is a skilled fighter who wears battered plate mail under a tabard adorned with his lord's colors. |
| 3 | Beren | Beren is a lanky man with messy brown hair and perpetually bloodshot eyes. He is a gambler, always looking for his next fix of ale and cards. |
| 4 | Cade | Cade is a burly blacksmith with a voice like thunder and a heart of gold. He wears a leather apron and carries a massive hammer. |
| 5 | Dariana | Dariana is a charismatic bard with a voice that can melt hearts and inspire courage. She wears a flowing ensemble of colorful silks and carries a lute. |
| 6 | Elric | Elric is a quiet man with a troubled past. He wears a hooded cloak and carries a longsword strapped to his back. |
| 7 | Gwendolyn | Gwendolyn is a regal woman with a sharp mind and a sharper tongue. She is a noble, dressed in finery adorned with jewels and carries a delicate fan. |
| 8 | Jarek | Jarek is a sneaky rogue with a quick wit and quicker hands. He wears dark leather clothing and carries a pair of daggers. |
| 9 | Kellan | Kellan is a rugged outdoorsman who prefers the company of animals to people. He wears a fur-lined cloak and carries a hunting bow. |
| 10 | Sariel | Sariel is a wise sage with a flowing beard and kind eyes. He wears simple robes and carries a gnarled staff. |
| 11 | Torn | Torn is a scarred warrior with a mean streak and a heart of ice. He wears battered plate mail and carries a greatsword. |
| 12 | Victaria | Victaria is a proud knight with a fierce sense of honor. She wears shining plate armor and carries a lance and shield. |
| 13 | Xander | Xander is a dashing adventurer with a dangerous reputation. He wears a cloak of many colors and carries a magical rapier. |
| 14 | Ysabel | Ysabel is a mysterious woman with a dark secret. She wears a hooded cloak and carries a slender dagger. |
| 15 | Zephyr | Zephyr is a carefree wanderer with a love for adventure. He wears loose clothing and carries a hand-crafted bo staff. |
